title: Promoted Offerings Asset Requirements
description: Requirements for promoted offerings creative assets. Allows formats to declare what content the promoted offerings must provide.

requires.description: Content that must be available in this format's promoted offerings. Each value is a presence check: the referenced field must exist and be non-empty. For brand.* paths, the validating agent resolves the brand reference first.

offering_asset_constraints.description: Per-group asset constraints that each offering must satisfy. Specifies what asset groups (e.g., headlines, images_landscape) offerings must provide and how many items each group requires. Only meaningful when 'offerings.assets' is included in requires.
